// utils.js
export function getCookie(name){const match=document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )'+name+'=([^;]+)'));if(match)return match[2];return null;}export function loadScriptsSequentially(scripts){return scripts.reduce((promise,script)=>{return promise.then(()=>loadScript(script));},Promise.resolve());}function loadScript(src){return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const script=document.createElement('script');script.src=src;script.onload=resolve;script.onerror=reject;document.body.appendChild(script);});}
